text: Alloh az saʙ kam mekunadu ʙa ruz meafzojad va az ruz kam mekunadu ʙa saʙ meafzojad va oftoʙu mohro rom kard. Har jake to zamone muajjan dar harakatand. In ast Alloh, Parvardigori sumo. Farmonravoi az oni Ust. Cizhoero, ki ƣajri U ma'ʙudi xes mexoned, moliki pusti mijoni donai xurmoe ham nestand
